title: Bug 134465JDBC DataSourcesampledb.Driver can not be finished.
description: Steps: 1. Create a data source, select JDBC DataSource 2. Click next 3. Select org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.sampledb.Driver (Classic Models Inc. SampleDB Driver) 4. Test connection(Success)The dialog can not be finished("Finish" button is still gray out)
